‚à´0M1‚à´M2‚àû[log‚Å°(1+hM‚Å¢P‚Å¢(hM,hE))‚àílog‚Å°(1+hE‚Å¢P‚Å¢(hM,hE))]+‚Å¢f‚Å¢(hM)‚Å¢f‚Å¢(hE)‚Å¢dhM‚Å¢dhE<Œ¥3,superscriptsubscript0subscriptùëÄ1superscriptsubscriptsubscriptùëÄ2superscriptdelimited-[]1subscript‚ÑéùëÄùëÉsubscript‚ÑéùëÄsubscript‚Ñéùê∏1subscript‚Ñéùê∏ùëÉsubscript‚ÑéùëÄsubscript‚Ñéùê∏ùëìsubscript‚ÑéùëÄùëìsubscript‚Ñéùê∏differential-dsubscript‚ÑéùëÄdifferential-dsubscript‚Ñéùê∏ùõø3\displaystyle\int_{0}^{M_{1}}\int_{M_{2}}^{\infty}\left[\log\left(1+h_{M}P(h_{M},h_{E})\right)-\log\left(1+h_{E}P(h_{M},h_{E})\right)\right]^{+}f(h_{M})f(h_{E}){\mathrm{d}}h_{M}{\mathrm{d}}h_{E}~{}<~{}\frac{\delta}{3}~{},‚à´ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_M start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à´ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚àû end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT [ roman_log ( 1 + italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_P ( italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ) - roman_log ( 1 + italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_P ( italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ) ] start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_f ( italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) italic_f ( italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) roman_d italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_d italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT < divide start_ARG italic_Œ¥ end_ARG start_ARG 3 end_ARG ,
‚à´M1‚àû‚à´0M2[log‚Å°(1+hM‚Å¢P‚Å¢(hM,hE))‚àílog‚Å°(1+hE‚Å¢P‚Å¢(hM,hE))]+‚Å¢f‚Å¢(hM)‚Å¢f‚Å¢(hE)‚Å¢dhM‚Å¢dhE<Œ¥3,superscriptsubscriptsubscriptùëÄ1superscriptsubscript0subscriptùëÄ2superscriptdelimited-[]1subscript‚ÑéùëÄùëÉsubscript‚ÑéùëÄsubscript‚Ñéùê∏1subscript‚Ñéùê∏ùëÉsubscript‚ÑéùëÄsubscript‚Ñéùê∏ùëìsubscript‚ÑéùëÄùëìsubscript‚Ñéùê∏differential-dsubscript‚ÑéùëÄdifferential-dsubscript‚Ñéùê∏ùõø3\displaystyle\int_{M_{1}}^{\infty}\int_{0}^{M_{2}}\left[\log\left(1+h_{M}P(h_{M},h_{E})\right)-\log\left(1+h_{E}P(h_{M},h_{E})\right)\right]^{+}f(h_{M})f(h_{E}){\mathrm{d}}h_{M}{\mathrm{d}}h_{E}~{}<~{}\frac{\delta}{3}~{},‚à´ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚àû end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à´ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_M start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT [ roman_log ( 1 + italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_P ( italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ) - roman_log ( 1 + italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_P ( italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ) ] start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_f ( italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) italic_f ( italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) roman_d italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_d italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT < divide start_ARG italic_Œ¥ end_ARG start_ARG 3 end_ARG , (19)
‚à´M1‚àû‚à´M2‚àû[log‚Å°(1+hM‚Å¢P‚Å¢(hM,hE))‚àílog‚Å°(1+hE‚Å¢P‚Å¢(hM,hE))]+‚Å¢f‚Å¢(hM)‚Å¢f‚Å¢(hE)‚Å¢dhM‚Å¢dhE<Œ¥3.superscriptsubscriptsubscriptùëÄ1superscriptsubscriptsubscriptùëÄ2superscriptdelimited-[]1subscript‚ÑéùëÄùëÉsubscript‚ÑéùëÄsubscript‚Ñéùê∏1subscript‚Ñéùê∏ùëÉsubscript‚ÑéùëÄsubscript‚Ñéùê∏ùëìsubscript‚ÑéùëÄùëìsubscript‚Ñéùê∏differential-dsubscript‚ÑéùëÄdifferential-dsubscript‚Ñéùê∏ùõø3\displaystyle\int_{M_{1}}^{\infty}\int_{M_{2}}^{\infty}\left[\log\left(1+h_{M}P(h_{M},h_{E})\right)-\log\left(1+h_{E}P(h_{M},h_{E})\right)\right]^{+}f(h_{M})f(h_{E}){\mathrm{d}}h_{M}{\mathrm{d}}h_{E}~{}<~{}\frac{\delta}{3}~{}.‚à´ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚àû end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à´ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚àû end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT [ roman_log ( 1 + italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_P ( italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ) - roman_log ( 1 + italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_P ( italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ) ] start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_f ( italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) italic_f ( italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) roman_d italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_d italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT < divide start_ARG italic_Œ¥ end_ARG start_ARG 3 end_ARG .

Moreover, for fixed M1subscriptùëÄ1M_{1}italic_M start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT and M2subscriptùëÄ2M_{2}italic_M start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT, the dominated convergence theorem implies that

‚â•‚à´0‚àû‚à´0‚àû[log‚Å°(1+hM‚Å¢P‚Å¢(hM,hE)1+hE‚Å¢P‚Å¢(hM,hE))]+‚Å¢f‚Å¢(hM)‚Å¢f‚Å¢(hE)‚Å¢dhM‚Å¢dhE‚àí2‚Å¢Œ¥.absentsuperscriptsubscript0superscriptsubscript0superscriptdelimited-[]1subscript‚ÑéùëÄùëÉsubscript‚ÑéùëÄsubscript‚Ñéùê∏1subscript‚Ñéùê∏ùëÉsubscript‚ÑéùëÄsubscript‚Ñéùê∏ùëìsubscript‚ÑéùëÄùëìsubscript‚Ñéùê∏differential-dsubscript‚ÑéùëÄdifferential-dsubscript‚Ñéùê∏2ùõø\geq\int_{0}^{\infty}\int_{0}^{\infty}\left[\log\left(\frac{1+h_{M}P(h_{M},h_{E})}{1+h_{E}P(h_{M},h_{E})}\right)\right]^{+}f(h_{M})f(h_{E}){\mathrm{d}}h_{M}{\mathrm{d}}h_{E}~{}-~{}2\delta.‚â• ‚à´ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚àû end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à´ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚àû end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT [ roman_log ( divide start_ARG 1 + italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_P ( italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) end_ARG start_ARG 1 + italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_P ( italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) end_ARG ) ] start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_f ( italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) italic_f ( italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) roman_d italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_d italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - 2 italic_Œ¥ . (21)

Combining (18) and (21), we get the desired result.

We now prove the converse part by showing that for any perfect secrecy rate RssubscriptùëÖùë†R_{s}italic_R start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_s end_POSTSUBSCRIPT with equivocation rate Re>Rs‚àíœµsubscriptùëÖùëísubscriptùëÖùë†italic-œµR_{e}>R_{s}-\epsilonitalic_R start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_e end_POSTSUBSCRIPT > italic_R start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_s end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - italic_œµ and error probability Pen‚Üí0‚ÜísuperscriptsubscriptùëÉùëíùëõ0P_{e}^{n}\rightarrow 0italic_P start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_e end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚Üí 0 as n‚Üí‚àû‚Üíùëõn\rightarrow\inftyitalic_n ‚Üí ‚àû, there exists a power allocation policy P‚Å¢(hM,hE)ùëÉsubscript‚ÑéùëÄsubscript‚Ñéùê∏P(h_{M},h_{E})italic_P ( italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) satisfying the average power constraint, such that

Rs‚â§‚à¨[log‚Å°(1+hM‚Å¢P‚Å¢(hM,hE))‚àílog‚Å°(1+hE‚Å¢P‚Å¢(hM,hE))]+‚Å¢f‚Å¢(hM)‚Å¢f‚Å¢(hE)‚Å¢dhM‚Å¢dhE.subscriptùëÖùë†double-integralsuperscriptdelimited-[]1subscript‚ÑéùëÄùëÉsubscript‚ÑéùëÄsubscript‚Ñéùê∏1subscript‚Ñéùê∏ùëÉsubscript‚ÑéùëÄsubscript‚Ñéùê∏ùëìsubscript‚ÑéùëÄùëìsubscript‚Ñéùê∏differential-dsubscript‚ÑéùëÄdifferential-dsubscript‚Ñéùê∏R_{s}~{}\leq~{}\iint\left[\log(1+h_{M}P(h_{M},h_{E}))-\log(1+h_{E}P(h_{M},h_{E}))\right]^{+}f(h_{M})f(h_{E}){\mathrm{d}}h_{M}{\mathrm{d}}h_{E}.italic_R start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_s end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚â§ ‚à¨ [ roman_log ( 1 + italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_P ( italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ) - roman_log ( 1 + italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_P ( italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ) ] start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_f ( italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) italic_f ( italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) roman_d italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_d italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT .

Consider any sequence of (2n‚Å¢Rs,n)superscript2ùëõsubscriptùëÖùë†ùëõ(2^{nR_{s}},n)( 2 start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n italic_R start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_s end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT , italic_n ) codes with perfect secrecy rate RssubscriptùëÖùë†R_{s}italic_R start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_s end_POSTSUBSCRIPT and equivocation rate ResubscriptùëÖùëíR_{e}italic_R start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_e end_POSTSUBSCRIPT, such that Re>Rs‚àíœµsubscriptùëÖùëísubscriptùëÖùë†italic-œµR_{e}>R_{s}-\epsilonitalic_R start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_e end_POSTSUBSCRIPT > italic_R start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_s end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - italic_œµ, with average power less than or equal to P¬Ø¬ØùëÉ\bar{P}over¬Ø start_ARG italic_P end_ARG and error probability Pen‚Üí0‚ÜísuperscriptsubscriptùëÉùëíùëõ0P_{e}^{n}\to 0italic_P start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_e end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚Üí 0 as n‚Üí‚àû‚Üíùëõn\rightarrow\inftyitalic_n ‚Üí ‚àû. Let N‚Å¢(hM,hE)ùëÅsubscript‚ÑéùëÄsubscript‚Ñéùê∏N(h_{M},h_{E})italic_N ( italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) denote the number of times the channel is in fading state (hM,hEsubscript‚ÑéùëÄsubscript‚Ñéùê∏h_{M},h_{E}italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT) over the interval [0,n]0ùëõ[0,n][ 0 , italic_n ]. Also let Pn‚Å¢(hM,hE)=ùîº‚Å¢{‚àëi=1n|xw‚Å¢(i)|2‚Å¢ùüè{hM‚Å¢(i)=hM,hE‚Å¢(i)=hE}}superscriptùëÉùëõsubscript‚ÑéùëÄsubscript‚Ñéùê∏ùîºsuperscriptsubscriptùëñ1ùëõsuperscriptsubscriptùë•ùë§ùëñ2subscript1formulae-sequencesubscript‚ÑéùëÄùëñsubscript‚ÑéùëÄsubscript‚Ñéùê∏ùëñsubscript‚Ñéùê∏P^{n}(h_{M},h_{E})={\mathbb{E}}\big{\{}\sum_{i=1}^{n}|x_{w}(i)|^{2}{\mathbf{1}}_{\{h_{M}(i)=h_{M},h_{E}(i)=h_{E}\}}\big{\}}italic_P start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) = blackboard_E { ‚àë start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT | italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_w end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_i ) | start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_1 start_POSTSUBSCRIPT { italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_i ) = italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_i ) = italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT } end_POSTSUBSCRIPT }, where {xw}subscriptùë•ùë§\{x_{w}\}{ italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_w end_POSTSUBSCRIPT } are the codewords corresponding to the message wùë§witalic_w and the expectation is taken over all codewords. We note that the equivocation H‚Å¢(W|Zn,hMn,hEn)ùêªconditionalùëäsuperscriptùëçùëõsuperscriptsubscript‚ÑéùëÄùëõsuperscriptsubscript‚Ñéùê∏ùëõH(W|Z^{n},h_{M}^{n},h_{E}^{n})italic_H ( italic_W | italic_Z start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT , italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT , italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) only depends on the marginal distribution of ZnsuperscriptùëçùëõZ^{n}italic_Z start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT, and thus does not depend on whether Z‚Å¢(i)ùëçùëñZ(i)italic_Z ( italic_i ) is a physically or stochastically degraded version of Y‚Å¢(i)ùëåùëñY(i)italic_Y ( italic_i ) or vice versa. Hence we assume in the following derivation that for any fading state, either Z‚Å¢(i)ùëçùëñZ(i)italic_Z ( italic_i ) is a physically degraded version of Y‚Å¢(i)ùëåùëñY(i)italic_Y ( italic_i ) or vice versa (since the noise processes are Gaussian), depending on the instantaneous channel state. Thus we have

n‚Å¢ReùëõsubscriptùëÖùëí\displaystyle nR_{e}italic_n italic_R start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_e end_POSTSUBSCRIPT =\displaystyle== H‚Å¢(W|Zn,hMn,hEn)ùêªconditionalùëäsuperscriptùëçùëõsuperscriptsubscript‚ÑéùëÄùëõsuperscriptsubscript‚Ñéùê∏ùëõ\displaystyle H(W|Z^{n},h_{M}^{n},h_{E}^{n})italic_H ( italic_W | italic_Z start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT , italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT , italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT )

‚â§(c)ùëê\displaystyle\overset{(c)}{\leq}start_OVERACCENT ( italic_c ) end_OVERACCENT start_ARG ‚â§ end_ARG ‚àëi=1n[H‚Å¢(Y‚Å¢(i)|Z‚Å¢(i),hM‚Å¢(i),hE‚Å¢(i))‚àíH‚Å¢(Y‚Å¢(i)|X‚Å¢(i),Z‚Å¢(i),hM‚Å¢(i),hE‚Å¢(i))]+n‚Å¢Œ¥nsuperscriptsubscriptùëñ1ùëõdelimited-[]ùêªconditionalùëåùëñùëçùëñsubscript‚ÑéùëÄùëñsubscript‚Ñéùê∏ùëñùêªconditionalùëåùëñùëãùëñùëçùëñsubscript‚ÑéùëÄùëñsubscript‚Ñéùê∏ùëñùëõsubscriptùõøùëõ\displaystyle\sum_{i=1}^{n}\left[H(Y(i)|Z(i),h_{M}(i),h_{E}(i))-H(Y(i)|X(i),Z(i),h_{M}(i),h_{E}(i))\right]+n\delta_{n}‚àë start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT [ italic_H ( italic_Y ( italic_i ) | italic_Z ( italic_i ) , italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_i ) , italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_i ) ) - italic_H ( italic_Y ( italic_i ) | italic_X ( italic_i ) , italic_Z ( italic_i ) , italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_i ) , italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_i ) ) ] + italic_n italic_Œ¥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUBSCRIPT
=\displaystyle== ‚àëi=1nI‚Å¢(X‚Å¢(i);Y‚Å¢(i)|Z‚Å¢(i),hM‚Å¢(i),hE‚Å¢(i))+n‚Å¢Œ¥nsuperscriptsubscriptùëñ1ùëõùêºùëãùëñconditionalùëåùëñùëçùëñsubscript‚ÑéùëÄùëñsubscript‚Ñéùê∏ùëñùëõsubscriptùõøùëõ\displaystyle\sum_{i=1}^{n}I(X(i);Y(i)|Z(i),h_{M}(i),h_{E}(i))+n\delta_{n}‚àë start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_I ( italic_X ( italic_i ) ; italic_Y ( italic_i ) | italic_Z ( italic_i ) , italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_i ) , italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_i ) ) + italic_n italic_Œ¥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUBSCRIPT
=\displaystyle== ‚àëi=1n‚à¨I‚Å¢(X;Y|Z,hM,hE)‚Å¢ùüè{hM‚Å¢(i)=hM,hE‚Å¢(i)=hE}‚Å¢dhM‚Å¢dhE+n‚Å¢Œ¥nsuperscriptsubscriptùëñ1ùëõdouble-integralùêºùëãconditionalùëåùëçsubscript‚ÑéùëÄsubscript‚Ñéùê∏subscript1formulae-sequencesubscript‚ÑéùëÄùëñsubscript‚ÑéùëÄsubscript‚Ñéùê∏ùëñsubscript‚Ñéùê∏differential-dsubscript‚ÑéùëÄdifferential-dsubscript‚Ñéùê∏ùëõsubscriptùõøùëõ\displaystyle\sum_{i=1}^{n}\iint I(X;Y|Z,h_{M},h_{E}){\mathbf{1}}_{\{h_{M}(i)=h_{M},h_{E}(i)=h_{E}\}}{\mathrm{d}}h_{M}{\mathrm{d}}h_{E}+n\delta_{n}‚àë start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à¨ italic_I ( italic_X ; italic_Y | italic_Z , italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) bold_1 start_POSTSUBSCRIPT { italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_i ) = italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_i ) = italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT } end_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_d italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_d italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_n italic_Œ¥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUBSCRIPT
=\displaystyle== ‚à¨I‚Å¢(X;Y|Z,hM,hE)‚Å¢N‚Å¢(hM,hE)‚Å¢dhM‚Å¢dhE+n‚Å¢Œ¥ndouble-integralùêºùëãconditionalùëåùëçsubscript‚ÑéùëÄsubscript‚Ñéùê∏ùëÅsubscript‚ÑéùëÄsubscript‚Ñéùê∏differential-dsubscript‚ÑéùëÄdifferential-dsubscript‚Ñéùê∏ùëõsubscriptùõøùëõ\displaystyle\iint I(X;Y|Z,h_{M},h_{E})N(h_{M},h_{E}){\mathrm{d}}h_{M}{\mathrm{d}}h_{E}+n\delta_{n}‚à¨ italic_I ( italic_X ; italic_Y | italic_Z , italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) italic_N ( italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) roman_d italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_d italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_n italic_Œ¥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUBSCRIPT
‚â§(d)ùëë\displaystyle\overset{(d)}{\leq}start_OVERACCENT ( italic_d ) end_OVERACCENT start_ARG ‚â§ end_ARG ‚à¨N‚Å¢(hM,hE)‚Å¢[log‚Å°(1+hM‚Å¢Pn‚Å¢(hM,hE))‚àílog‚Å°(1+hE‚Å¢Pn‚Å¢(hM,hE))]+‚Å¢dhM‚Å¢dhE+n‚Å¢Œ¥n.double-integralùëÅsubscript‚ÑéùëÄsubscript‚Ñéùê∏superscriptdelimited-[]1subscript‚ÑéùëÄsuperscriptùëÉùëõsubscript‚ÑéùëÄsubscript‚Ñéùê∏1subscript‚Ñéùê∏superscriptùëÉùëõsubscript‚ÑéùëÄsubscript‚Ñéùê∏differential-dsubscript‚ÑéùëÄdifferential-dsubscript‚Ñéùê∏ùëõsubscriptùõøùëõ\displaystyle\iint N(h_{M},h_{E})\left[\log(1+h_{M}P^{n}(h_{M},h_{E}))-\log(1+h_{E}P^{n}(h_{M},h_{E}))\right]^{+}{\mathrm{d}}h_{M}{\mathrm{d}}h_{E}+n\delta_{n}.‚à¨ italic_N ( italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) [ roman_log ( 1 + italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_P start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ) - roman_log ( 1 + italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_P start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ) ] start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT roman_d italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_d italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_n italic_Œ¥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUBSCRIPT .

In the above derivation, (a) follows from the Fano inequality, (b) follows from the data processing inequality since W‚ÜíXn‚Üí(Yn,Zn)‚Üíùëäsuperscriptùëãùëõ‚ÜísuperscriptùëåùëõsuperscriptùëçùëõW\to X^{n}\to(Y^{n},Z^{n})italic_W ‚Üí italic_X start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚Üí ( italic_Y start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT , italic_Z start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) forms a Markov chain, (c) follows from the fact that conditioning reduces entropy and from the memoryless property of the channel, (d) follows from the fact that given hMsubscript‚ÑéùëÄh_{M}italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT and hEsubscript‚Ñéùê∏h_{E}italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT, the fading channel reduces to an AWGN channel with channel gains (hM,hE)subscript‚ÑéùëÄsubscript‚Ñéùê∏(h_{M},h_{E})( italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) and average transmission power Pn‚Å¢(hM,hE)superscriptùëÉùëõsubscript‚ÑéùëÄsubscript‚Ñéùê∏P^{n}(h_{M},h_{E})italic_P start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ), for which

I‚Å¢(X;Y|Z,hM,hE)‚â§[log‚Å°(1+hM‚Å¢Pn‚Å¢(hM,hE))‚àílog‚Å°(1+hE‚Å¢Pn‚Å¢(hM,hE))]+,ùêºùëãconditionalùëåùëçsubscript‚ÑéùëÄsubscript‚Ñéùê∏superscriptdelimited-[]1subscript‚ÑéùëÄsuperscriptùëÉùëõsubscript‚ÑéùëÄsubscript‚Ñéùê∏1subscript‚Ñéùê∏superscriptùëÉùëõsubscript‚ÑéùëÄsubscript‚Ñéùê∏I(X;Y|Z,h_{M},h_{E})~{}\leq~{}\left[\log(1+h_{M}P^{n}(h_{M},h_{E}))-\log(1+h_{E}P^{n}(h_{M},h_{E}))\right]^{+}~{},italic_I ( italic_X ; italic_Y | italic_Z , italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ‚â§ [ roman_log ( 1 + italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_P start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ) - roman_log ( 1 + italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_P start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ) ] start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ,

as shown in [5, 6]. Since the codewords satisfy the power constraint, we have

‚à¨Pn‚Å¢(hM,hE)‚Å¢(N‚Å¢(hM,hE)n)‚Å¢dhM‚Å¢dhE‚â§P¬Ø.double-integralsuperscriptùëÉùëõsubscript‚ÑéùëÄsubscript‚Ñéùê∏ùëÅsubscript‚ÑéùëÄsubscript‚Ñéùê∏ùëõdifferential-dsubscript‚ÑéùëÄdifferential-dsubscript‚Ñéùê∏¬ØùëÉ\iint P^{n}(h_{M},h_{E})\left(\frac{N(h_{M},h_{E})}{n}\right){\mathrm{d}}h_{M}{\mathrm{d}}h_{E}~{}\leq~{}\bar{P}.‚à¨ italic_P start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ( divide start_ARG italic_N ( italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) end_ARG start_ARG italic_n end_ARG ) roman_d italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_d italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚â§ over¬Ø start_ARG italic_P end_ARG .

For any hM,hEsubscript‚ÑéùëÄsubscript‚Ñéùê∏h_{M},h_{E}italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT such that f‚Å¢(hM,hE)‚â†0ùëìsubscript‚ÑéùëÄsubscript‚Ñéùê∏0f(h_{M},h_{E})\neq 0italic_f ( italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ‚â† 0, {Pn‚Å¢(hM,hE)}superscriptùëÉùëõsubscript‚ÑéùëÄsubscript‚Ñéùê∏\{P^{n}(h_{M},h_{E})\}{ italic_P start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) } are bounded sequences in nùëõnitalic_n. Thus there exists a subsequence that converges to a limit P‚Å¢(hM,hE)ùëÉsubscript‚ÑéùëÄsubscript‚Ñéùê∏P(h_{M},h_{E})italic_P ( italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) as n‚Üí‚àû‚Üíùëõn\rightarrow\inftyitalic_n ‚Üí ‚àû. Since for each nùëõnitalic_n, the power constraint is satisfied, we have

‚à¨P‚Å¢(hM,hE)‚Å¢f‚Å¢(hM)‚Å¢f‚Å¢(hE)‚Å¢dhM‚Å¢dhE‚â§P¬Ø.double-integralùëÉsubscript‚ÑéùëÄsubscript‚Ñéùê∏ùëìsubscript‚ÑéùëÄùëìsubscript‚Ñéùê∏differential-dsubscript‚ÑéùëÄdifferential-dsubscript‚Ñéùê∏¬ØùëÉ\iint P(h_{M},h_{E})f(h_{M})f(h_{E}){\mathrm{d}}h_{M}{\mathrm{d}}h_{E}~{}\leq~{}\bar{P}.‚à¨ italic_P ( italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) italic_f ( italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) italic_f ( italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) roman_d italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_d italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚â§ over¬Ø start_ARG italic_P end_ARG . (23)

Now, we have

Re‚â§‚à¨N‚Å¢(hM,hE)n‚Å¢[log‚Å°(1+hM‚Å¢Pn‚Å¢(hM,hE)1+hE‚Å¢Pn‚Å¢(hM,hE))]+‚Å¢dhM‚Å¢dhE+Œ¥n.subscriptùëÖùëídouble-integralùëÅsubscript‚ÑéùëÄsubscript‚Ñéùê∏ùëõsuperscriptdelimited-[]1subscript‚ÑéùëÄsuperscriptùëÉùëõsubscript‚ÑéùëÄsubscript‚Ñéùê∏1subscript‚Ñéùê∏superscriptùëÉùëõsubscript‚ÑéùëÄsubscript‚Ñéùê∏differential-dsubscript‚ÑéùëÄdifferential-dsubscript‚Ñéùê∏subscriptùõøùëõR_{e}~{}\leq~{}\iint\frac{N(h_{M},h_{E})}{n}\left[\log\left(\frac{1+h_{M}P^{n}(h_{M},h_{E})}{1+h_{E}P^{n}(h_{M},h_{E})}\right)\right]^{+}{\mathrm{d}}h_{M}{\mathrm{d}}h_{E}+\delta_{n}.italic_R start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_e end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚â§ ‚à¨ divide start_ARG italic_N ( italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) end_ARG start_ARG italic_n end_ARG [ roman_log ( divide start_ARG 1 + italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_P start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) end_ARG start_ARG 1 + italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_P start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) end_ARG ) ] start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT roman_d italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_d italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_Œ¥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUBSCRIPT .

Taking the limit along the convergent subsequence and using the ergodicity of the channel, we get

Re‚â§‚à¨[log‚Å°(1+hM‚Å¢P‚Å¢(hM,hE)1+hE‚Å¢P‚Å¢(hM,hE))]+‚Å¢f‚Å¢(hM)‚Å¢f‚Å¢(hE)‚Å¢dhM‚Å¢dhE+Œ¥n.subscriptùëÖùëídouble-integralsuperscriptdelimited-[]1subscript‚ÑéùëÄùëÉsubscript‚ÑéùëÄsubscript‚Ñéùê∏1subscript‚Ñéùê∏ùëÉsubscript‚ÑéùëÄsubscript‚Ñéùê∏ùëìsubscript‚ÑéùëÄùëìsubscript‚Ñéùê∏differential-dsubscript‚ÑéùëÄdifferential-dsubscript‚Ñéùê∏subscriptùõøùëõR_{e}~{}\leq~{}\iint\left[\log\left(\frac{1+h_{M}P(h_{M},h_{E})}{1+h_{E}P(h_{M},h_{E})}\right)\right]^{+}f(h_{M})f(h_{E}){\mathrm{d}}h_{M}{\mathrm{d}}h_{E}+\delta_{n}.italic_R start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_e end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚â§ ‚à¨ [ roman_log ( divide start_ARG 1 + italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_P ( italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) end_ARG start_ARG 1 + italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_P ( italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) end_ARG ) ] start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_f ( italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) italic_f ( italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) roman_d italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_d italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_Œ¥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUBSCRIPT .

The claim is thus proved.

Appendix B Proof of Theorem¬†2

Let Rs=Cs(M)‚àíŒ¥subscriptùëÖùë†superscriptsubscriptùê∂ùë†ùëÄùõøR_{s}=C_{s}^{(M)}-\deltaitalic_R start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_s end_POSTSUBSCRIPT = italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_s end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_M ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - italic_Œ¥ for some small Œ¥>0ùõø0\delta>0italic_Œ¥ > 0. Let n=n1‚Å¢mùëõsubscriptùëõ1ùëön=n_{1}mitalic_n = italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_m, where n1subscriptùëõ1n_{1}italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT represents the number of symbols transmitted in each coherence interval, and mùëömitalic_m represents the number of coherence intervals over which the message WùëäWitalic_W is transmitted. Let R=ùîº‚Å¢{log‚Å°(1+hM‚Å¢P‚Å¢(hM))}‚àíœµùëÖùîº1subscript‚ÑéùëÄùëÉsubscript‚ÑéùëÄitalic-œµR={\mathbb{E}}\{\log\left(1+h_{M}P(h_{M})\right)\}-\epsilonitalic_R = blackboard_E { roman_log ( 1 + italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_P ( italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ) } - italic_œµ. We first generate all binary sequences {ùêï}ùêï\{{\mathbf{V}}\}{ bold_V } of length n‚Å¢RùëõùëÖnRitalic_n italic_R and then independently assign each of them randomly to one of 2n‚Å¢Rssuperscript2ùëõsubscriptùëÖùë†2^{nR_{s}}2 start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n italic_R start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_s end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT groups, according to a uniform distribution. This ensures that any of the sequences are equally likely to be within any of the groups. Each secret message w‚àà{1,‚ãØ,2n‚Å¢Rs}ùë§1‚ãØsuperscript2ùëõsubscriptùëÖùë†w\in\{1,\cdots,2^{nR_{s}}\}italic_w ‚àà { 1 , ‚ãØ , 2 start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n italic_R start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_s end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT } is then assigned a group ùêï‚Å¢(w)ùêïùë§{\mathbf{V}}(w)bold_V ( italic_w ). To encode a particular message wùë§witalic_w, the stochastic encoder randomly selects a sequence ùêØùêØ{\mathbf{v}}bold_v from the corresponding group ùêï‚Å¢(w)ùêïùë§{\mathbf{V}}(w)bold_V ( italic_w ), according to a uniform distribution. This sequence ùêØùêØ{\mathbf{v}}bold_v consisting of n‚Å¢RùëõùëÖnRitalic_n italic_R bits is then sub-divided into independent blocks {ùêØ‚Å¢(1),‚ãØ,ùêØ‚Å¢(m)}ùêØ1‚ãØùêØùëö\{{\mathbf{v}}(1),\cdots,{\mathbf{v}}(m)\}{ bold_v ( 1 ) , ‚ãØ , bold_v ( italic_m ) }, where the block ùêØ‚Å¢(i)ùêØùëñ{\mathbf{v}}(i)bold_v ( italic_i ) consists of n1‚Å¢[log‚Å°(1+hM‚Å¢(i)‚Å¢P‚Å¢(hM‚Å¢(i)))‚àíœµ]subscriptùëõ1delimited-[]1subscript‚ÑéùëÄùëñùëÉsubscript‚ÑéùëÄùëñitalic-œµn_{1}\left[\log\left(1+h_{M}(i)P(h_{M}(i))\right)-\epsilon\right]italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT [ roman_log ( 1 + italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_i ) italic_P ( italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_i ) ) ) - italic_œµ ] bits, and is transmitted in the it‚Å¢hsuperscriptùëñùë°‚Ñéi^{th}italic_i start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_t italic_h end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT coherence interval (i‚àà{1,‚ãØ,m}ùëñ1‚ãØùëöi\in\{1,\cdots,m\}italic_i ‚àà { 1 , ‚ãØ , italic_m }). As m‚Üí‚àû‚Üíùëöm\to\inftyitalic_m ‚Üí ‚àû, using the ergodicity of the channel, we have

limm‚Üí‚àû‚àëi=1mn1‚Å¢[log‚Å°(1+hM‚Å¢(i)‚Å¢P‚Å¢(hM‚Å¢(i)))‚àíœµ]=n1‚Å¢m‚Å¢[ùîº‚Å¢{log‚Å°(1+hM‚Å¢P‚Å¢(hM))}‚àíœµ]=n‚Å¢R.subscript‚Üíùëösuperscriptsubscriptùëñ1ùëösubscriptùëõ1delimited-[]1subscript‚ÑéùëÄùëñùëÉsubscript‚ÑéùëÄùëñitalic-œµsubscriptùëõ1ùëödelimited-[]ùîº1subscript‚ÑéùëÄùëÉsubscript‚ÑéùëÄitalic-œµùëõùëÖ\lim_{m\to\infty}~{}\sum_{i=1}^{m}n_{1}\left[\log\left(1+h_{M}(i)P(h_{M}(i))\right)-\epsilon\right]~{}=~{}n_{1}m\left[{\mathbb{E}}\{\log\left(1+h_{M}P(h_{M})\right)\}-\epsilon\right]~{}=~{}nR.roman_lim start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_m ‚Üí ‚àû end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚àë start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_m end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT [ roman_log ( 1 + italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_i ) italic_P ( italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_i ) ) ) - italic_œµ ] = italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_m [ blackboard_E { roman_log ( 1 + italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_P ( italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ) } - italic_œµ ] = italic_n italic_R .

We then generate i.i.d. Gaussian codebooks {Xn1‚Å¢(i):i=1,‚ãØ,m}conditional-setsuperscriptùëãsubscriptùëõ1ùëñùëñ1‚ãØùëö\{X^{n_{1}}(i):i=1,\cdots,m\}{ italic_X start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_i ) : italic_i = 1 , ‚ãØ , italic_m } consisting of 2n1‚Å¢[log‚Å°(1+hM‚Å¢(i)‚Å¢P‚Å¢(hM‚Å¢(i)))‚àíœµ]superscript2subscriptùëõ1delimited-[]1subscript‚ÑéùëÄùëñùëÉsubscript‚ÑéùëÄùëñitalic-œµ2^{n_{1}\left[\log\left(1+h_{M}(i)P(h_{M}(i))\right)-\epsilon\right]}2 start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT [ roman_log ( 1 + italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_i ) italic_P ( italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_i ) ) ) - italic_œµ ] end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT codewords, each of length n1subscriptùëõ1n_{1}italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT symbols. In the it‚Å¢hsuperscriptùëñùë°‚Ñéi^{th}italic_i start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_t italic_h end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT coherence interval, the transmitter encodes the block ùêØ‚Å¢(i)ùêØùëñ{\mathbf{v}}(i)bold_v ( italic_i ) into the codeword xn1‚Å¢(i)superscriptùë•subscriptùëõ1ùëñx^{n_{1}}(i)italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_i ), which is then transmitted over the fading channel. The legitimate receiver receives yn1‚Å¢(i)superscriptùë¶subscriptùëõ1ùëñy^{n_{1}}(i)italic_y start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_i ) while the eavesdropper receives zn1‚Å¢(i)superscriptùëßsubscriptùëõ1ùëñz^{n_{1}}(i)italic_z start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_i ) in the it‚Å¢hsuperscriptùëñùë°‚Ñéi^{th}italic_i start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_t italic_h end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT coherence interval. The equivocation rate at the eavesdropper can then be lower bounded as follows.

n‚Å¢ReùëõsubscriptùëÖùëí\displaystyle nR_{e}italic_n italic_R start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_e end_POSTSUBSCRIPT =\displaystyle== H‚Å¢(W|Zn1‚Å¢(1),‚ãØ,Zn1‚Å¢(m),hMn,hEn)ùêªconditionalùëäsuperscriptùëçsubscriptùëõ11‚ãØsuperscriptùëçsubscriptùëõ1ùëösuperscriptsubscript‚ÑéùëÄùëõsuperscriptsubscript‚Ñéùê∏ùëõ\displaystyle H(W|Z^{n_{1}}(1),\cdots,Z^{n_{1}}(m),h_{M}^{n},h_{E}^{n})italic_H ( italic_W | italic_Z start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( 1 ) , ‚ãØ , italic_Z start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_m ) , italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT , italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT )
=\displaystyle== H‚Å¢(W,Zn1‚Å¢(1),‚ãØ,Zn1‚Å¢(m)|hMn,hEn)‚àíH‚Å¢(Zn1‚Å¢(1),‚ãØ,Zn1‚Å¢(m)|hMn,hEn)ùêªùëäsuperscriptùëçsubscriptùëõ11‚ãØconditionalsuperscriptùëçsubscriptùëõ1ùëösuperscriptsubscript‚ÑéùëÄùëõsuperscriptsubscript‚Ñéùê∏ùëõùêªsuperscriptùëçsubscriptùëõ11‚ãØconditionalsuperscriptùëçsubscriptùëõ1ùëösuperscriptsubscript‚ÑéùëÄùëõsuperscriptsubscript‚Ñéùê∏ùëõ\displaystyle H(W,Z^{n_{1}}(1),\cdots,Z^{n_{1}}(m)|h_{M}^{n},h_{E}^{n})-H(Z^{n_{1}}(1),\cdots,Z^{n_{1}}(m)|h_{M}^{n},h_{E}^{n})italic_H ( italic_W , italic_Z start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( 1 ) , ‚ãØ , italic_Z start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_m ) | italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT , italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) - italic_H ( italic_Z start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( 1 ) , ‚ãØ , italic_Z start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_m ) | italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT , italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT )
=\displaystyle== H‚Å¢(W,Zn1‚Å¢(1),‚ãØ,Zn1‚Å¢(m),Xn1‚Å¢(1),‚ãØ,Xn1‚Å¢(m)|hMn,hEn)‚àíH‚Å¢(Zn1‚Å¢(1),‚ãØ,Zn1‚Å¢(m)|hMn,hEn)ùêªùëäsuperscriptùëçsubscriptùëõ11‚ãØsuperscriptùëçsubscriptùëõ1ùëösuperscriptùëãsubscriptùëõ11‚ãØconditionalsuperscriptùëãsubscriptùëõ1ùëösuperscriptsubscript‚ÑéùëÄùëõsuperscriptsubscript‚Ñéùê∏ùëõùêªsuperscriptùëçsubscriptùëõ11‚ãØconditionalsuperscriptùëçsubscriptùëõ1ùëösuperscriptsubscript‚ÑéùëÄùëõsuperscriptsubscript‚Ñéùê∏ùëõ\displaystyle H(W,Z^{n_{1}}(1),\cdots,Z^{n_{1}}(m),X^{n_{1}}(1),\cdots,X^{n_{1}}(m)|h_{M}^{n},h_{E}^{n})-H(Z^{n_{1}}(1),\cdots,Z^{n_{1}}(m)|h_{M}^{n},h_{E}^{n})italic_H ( italic_W , italic_Z start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( 1 ) , ‚ãØ , italic_Z start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_m ) , italic_X start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( 1 ) , ‚ãØ , italic_X start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_m ) | italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT , italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) - italic_H ( italic_Z start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( 1 ) , ‚ãØ , italic_Z start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_m ) | italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT , italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT )

‚àíH‚Å¢(Xn1‚Å¢(1),‚ãØ,Xn1‚Å¢(m)|W,Zn1‚Å¢(1),‚ãØ,Zn1‚Å¢(m),hMn,hEn)ùêªsuperscriptùëãsubscriptùëõ11‚ãØconditionalsuperscriptùëãsubscriptùëõ1ùëöùëäsuperscriptùëçsubscriptùëõ11‚ãØsuperscriptùëçsubscriptùëõ1ùëösuperscriptsubscript‚ÑéùëÄùëõsuperscriptsubscript‚Ñéùê∏ùëõ\displaystyle\hskip 144.54pt-H(X^{n_{1}}(1),\cdots,X^{n_{1}}(m)|W,Z^{n_{1}}(1),\cdots,Z^{n_{1}}(m),h_{M}^{n},h_{E}^{n})- italic_H ( italic_X start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( 1 ) , ‚ãØ , italic_X start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_m ) | italic_W , italic_Z start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( 1 ) , ‚ãØ , italic_Z start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_m ) , italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT , italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT )
=\displaystyle== H‚Å¢(Xn1‚Å¢(1),‚ãØ,Xn1‚Å¢(m)|Zn1‚Å¢(1),‚ãØ,Zn1‚Å¢(m),hMn,hEn)ùêªsuperscriptùëãsubscriptùëõ11‚ãØconditionalsuperscriptùëãsubscriptùëõ1ùëösuperscriptùëçsubscriptùëõ11‚ãØsuperscriptùëçsubscriptùëõ1ùëösuperscriptsubscript‚ÑéùëÄùëõsuperscriptsubscript‚Ñéùê∏ùëõ\displaystyle H(X^{n_{1}}(1),\cdots,X^{n_{1}}(m)|Z^{n_{1}}(1),\cdots,Z^{n_{1}}(m),h_{M}^{n},h_{E}^{n})italic_H ( italic_X start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( 1 ) , ‚ãØ , italic_X start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_m ) | italic_Z start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( 1 ) , ‚ãØ , italic_Z start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_m ) , italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT , italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT )
‚àíH‚Å¢(Xn1‚Å¢(1),‚ãØ,Xn1‚Å¢(m)|W,Zn1‚Å¢(1),‚ãØ,Zn1‚Å¢(m),hMn,hEn)ùêªsuperscriptùëãsubscriptùëõ11‚ãØconditionalsuperscriptùëãsubscriptùëõ1ùëöùëäsuperscriptùëçsubscriptùëõ11‚ãØsuperscriptùëçsubscriptùëõ1ùëösuperscriptsubscript‚ÑéùëÄùëõsuperscriptsubscript‚Ñéùê∏ùëõ\displaystyle\hskip 144.54pt-H(X^{n_{1}}(1),\cdots,X^{n_{1}}(m)|W,Z^{n_{1}}(1),\cdots,Z^{n_{1}}(m),h_{M}^{n},h_{E}^{n})- italic_H ( italic_X start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( 1 ) , ‚ãØ , italic_X start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_m ) | italic_W , italic_Z start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( 1 ) , ‚ãØ , italic_Z start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_m ) , italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT , italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT )
=(a)ùëé\displaystyle\overset{(a)}{=}start_OVERACCENT ( italic_a ) end_OVERACCENT start_ARG = end_ARG ‚àëi=1mH‚Å¢(Xn1‚Å¢(i)|Zn1‚Å¢(i),hM‚Å¢(i),hE‚Å¢(i))‚àíH‚Å¢(Xn1‚Å¢(1),‚ãØ,Xn1‚Å¢(m)|W,Zn1‚Å¢(1),‚ãØ,Zn1‚Å¢(m),hMn,hEn)superscriptsubscriptùëñ1ùëöùêªconditionalsuperscriptùëãsubscriptùëõ1ùëñsuperscriptùëçsubscriptùëõ1ùëñsubscript‚ÑéùëÄùëñsubscript‚Ñéùê∏ùëñùêªsuperscriptùëãsubscriptùëõ11‚ãØconditionalsuperscriptùëãsubscriptùëõ1ùëöùëäsuperscriptùëçsubscriptùëõ11‚ãØsuperscriptùëçsubscriptùëõ1ùëösuperscriptsubscript‚ÑéùëÄùëõsuperscriptsubscript‚Ñéùê∏ùëõ\displaystyle\sum_{i=1}^{m}H(X^{n_{1}}(i)|Z^{n_{1}}(i),h_{M}(i),h_{E}(i))-H(X^{n_{1}}(1),\cdots,X^{n_{1}}(m)|W,Z^{n_{1}}(1),\cdots,Z^{n_{1}}(m),h_{M}^{n},h_{E}^{n})‚àë start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_m end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_H ( italic_X start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_i ) | italic_Z start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_i ) , italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_i ) , italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_i ) ) - italic_H ( italic_X start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( 1 ) , ‚ãØ , italic_X start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_m ) | italic_W , italic_Z start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( 1 ) , ‚ãØ , italic_Z start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_m ) , italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT , italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT )
‚â•(b)ùëè\displaystyle\overset{(b)}{\geq}start_OVERACCENT ( italic_b ) end_OVERACCENT start_ARG ‚â• end_ARG ‚àëi‚ààùí©mH‚Å¢(Xn1‚Å¢(i)|Zn1‚Å¢(i),hM‚Å¢(i),hE‚Å¢(i))‚àíH‚Å¢(Xn1‚Å¢(1),‚ãØ,Xn1‚Å¢(m)|W,Zn1‚Å¢(1),‚ãØ,Zn1‚Å¢(m),hMn,hEn)subscriptùëñsubscriptùí©ùëöùêªconditionalsuperscriptùëãsubscriptùëõ1ùëñsuperscriptùëçsubscriptùëõ1ùëñsubscript‚ÑéùëÄùëñsubscript‚Ñéùê∏ùëñùêªsuperscriptùëãsubscriptùëõ11‚ãØconditionalsuperscriptùëãsubscriptùëõ1ùëöùëäsuperscriptùëçsubscriptùëõ11‚ãØsuperscriptùëçsubscriptùëõ1ùëösuperscriptsubscript‚ÑéùëÄùëõsuperscriptsubscript‚Ñéùê∏ùëõ\displaystyle\sum_{i\in{\mathcal{N}}_{m}}H(X^{n_{1}}(i)|Z^{n_{1}}(i),h_{M}(i),h_{E}(i))-H(X^{n_{1}}(1),\cdots,X^{n_{1}}(m)|W,Z^{n_{1}}(1),\cdots,Z^{n_{1}}(m),h_{M}^{n},h_{E}^{n})‚àë start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i ‚àà caligraphic_N start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_H ( italic_X start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_i ) | italic_Z start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_i ) , italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_i ) , italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_i ) ) - italic_H ( italic_X start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( 1 ) , ‚ãØ , italic_X start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_m ) | italic_W , italic_Z start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( 1 ) , ‚ãØ , italic_Z start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_m ) , italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT , italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT )
=\displaystyle== ‚àëi‚ààùí©m[H‚Å¢(Xn1‚Å¢(i)|hM‚Å¢(i),hE‚Å¢(i))‚àíI‚Å¢(Xn1‚Å¢(i);Zn1‚Å¢(i)|hM‚Å¢(i),hE‚Å¢(i))]subscriptùëñsubscriptùí©ùëödelimited-[]ùêªconditionalsuperscriptùëãsubscriptùëõ1ùëñsubscript‚ÑéùëÄùëñsubscript‚Ñéùê∏ùëñùêºsuperscriptùëãsubscriptùëõ1ùëñconditionalsuperscriptùëçsubscriptùëõ1ùëñsubscript‚ÑéùëÄùëñsubscript‚Ñéùê∏ùëñ\displaystyle\sum_{i\in{\mathcal{N}}_{m}}\left[H(X^{n_{1}}(i)|h_{M}(i),h_{E}(i))-I(X^{n_{1}}(i);Z^{n_{1}}(i)|h_{M}(i),h_{E}(i))\right]‚àë start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i ‚àà caligraphic_N start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT [ italic_H ( italic_X start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_i ) | italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_i ) , italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_i ) ) - italic_I ( italic_X start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_i ) ; italic_Z start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_i ) | italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_i ) , italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_i ) ) ]
‚àíH‚Å¢(Xn1‚Å¢(1),‚ãØ,Xn1‚Å¢(m)|W,Zn1‚Å¢(1),‚ãØ,Zn1‚Å¢(m),hMn,hEn)ùêªsuperscriptùëãsubscriptùëõ11‚ãØconditionalsuperscriptùëãsubscriptùëõ1ùëöùëäsuperscriptùëçsubscriptùëõ11‚ãØsuperscriptùëçsubscriptùëõ1ùëösuperscriptsubscript‚ÑéùëÄùëõsuperscriptsubscript‚Ñéùê∏ùëõ\displaystyle\hskip 144.54pt-H(X^{n_{1}}(1),\cdots,X^{n_{1}}(m)|W,Z^{n_{1}}(1),\cdots,Z^{n_{1}}(m),h_{M}^{n},h_{E}^{n})- italic_H ( italic_X start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( 1 ) , ‚ãØ , italic_X start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_m ) | italic_W , italic_Z start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( 1 ) , ‚ãØ , italic_Z start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_m ) , italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT , italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT )
‚â•\displaystyle\geq‚â• ‚àëi‚ààùí©mn1‚Å¢[log‚Å°(1+hM‚Å¢(i)‚Å¢P‚Å¢(hM‚Å¢(i)))‚àílog‚Å°(1+hE‚Å¢(i)‚Å¢P‚Å¢(hM‚Å¢(i)))‚àíœµ]subscriptùëñsubscriptùí©ùëösubscriptùëõ1delimited-[]1subscript‚ÑéùëÄùëñùëÉsubscript‚ÑéùëÄùëñ1subscript‚Ñéùê∏ùëñùëÉsubscript‚ÑéùëÄùëñitalic-œµ\displaystyle\sum_{i\in{\mathcal{N}}_{m}}n_{1}\left[\log\left(1+h_{M}(i)P(h_{M}(i))\right)-\log\left(1+h_{E}(i)P(h_{M}(i))\right)-\epsilon\right]‚àë start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i ‚àà caligraphic_N start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT [ roman_log ( 1 + italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_i ) italic_P ( italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_i ) ) ) - roman_log ( 1 + italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_i ) italic_P ( italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_i ) ) ) - italic_œµ ]
‚àíH‚Å¢(Xn1‚Å¢(1),‚ãØ,Xn1‚Å¢(m)|W,Zn1‚Å¢(1),‚ãØ,Zn1‚Å¢(m),hMn,hEn)ùêªsuperscriptùëãsubscriptùëõ11‚ãØconditionalsuperscriptùëãsubscriptùëõ1ùëöùëäsuperscriptùëçsubscriptùëõ11‚ãØsuperscriptùëçsubscriptùëõ1ùëösuperscriptsubscript‚ÑéùëÄùëõsuperscriptsubscript‚Ñéùê∏ùëõ\displaystyle\hskip 144.54pt-H(X^{n_{1}}(1),\cdots,X^{n_{1}}(m)|W,Z^{n_{1}}(1),\cdots,Z^{n_{1}}(m),h_{M}^{n},h_{E}^{n})- italic_H ( italic_X start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( 1 ) , ‚ãØ , italic_X start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_m ) | italic_W , italic_Z start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( 1 ) , ‚ãØ , italic_Z start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_m ) , italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT , italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT )
‚â•\displaystyle\geq‚â• ‚àëi=1mn1‚Å¢{[log‚Å°(1+hM‚Å¢(i)‚Å¢P‚Å¢(hM‚Å¢(i)))‚àílog‚Å°(1+hE‚Å¢(i)‚Å¢P‚Å¢(hM‚Å¢(i)))]+‚àíœµ}superscriptsubscriptùëñ1ùëösubscriptùëõ1superscriptdelimited-[]1subscript‚ÑéùëÄùëñùëÉsubscript‚ÑéùëÄùëñ1subscript‚Ñéùê∏ùëñùëÉsubscript‚ÑéùëÄùëñitalic-œµ\displaystyle\sum_{i=1}^{m}n_{1}\left\{\left[\log\left(1+h_{M}(i)P(h_{M}(i))\right)-\log\left(1+h_{E}(i)P(h_{M}(i))\right)\right]^{+}-\epsilon\right\}‚àë start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_m end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT { [ roman_log ( 1 + italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_i ) italic_P ( italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_i ) ) ) - roman_log ( 1 + italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_i ) italic_P ( italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_i ) ) ) ] start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - italic_œµ } (24)
‚àíH‚Å¢(Xn1‚Å¢(1),‚ãØ,Xn1‚Å¢(m)|W,Zn1‚Å¢(1),‚ãØ,Zn1‚Å¢(m),hMn,hEn)ùêªsuperscriptùëãsubscriptùëõ11‚ãØconditionalsuperscriptùëãsubscriptùëõ1ùëöùëäsuperscriptùëçsubscriptùëõ11‚ãØsuperscriptùëçsubscriptùëõ1ùëösuperscriptsubscript‚ÑéùëÄùëõsuperscriptsubscript‚Ñéùê∏ùëõ\displaystyle\hskip 144.54pt-H(X^{n_{1}}(1),\cdots,X^{n_{1}}(m)|W,Z^{n_{1}}(1),\cdots,Z^{n_{1}}(m),h_{M}^{n},h_{E}^{n})- italic_H ( italic_X start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( 1 ) , ‚ãØ , italic_X start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_m ) | italic_W , italic_Z start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( 1 ) , ‚ãØ , italic_Z start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_m ) , italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT , italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT )
=(c)ùëê\displaystyle\overset{(c)}{=}start_OVERACCENT ( italic_c ) end_OVERACCENT start_ARG = end_ARG n‚Å¢Cs(M)‚àíH‚Å¢(Xn1‚Å¢(1),‚ãØ,Xn1‚Å¢(m)|W,Zn1‚Å¢(1),‚ãØ,Zn1‚Å¢(m),hMn,hEn)‚àín‚Å¢œµ.ùëõsuperscriptsubscriptùê∂ùë†ùëÄùêªsuperscriptùëãsubscriptùëõ11‚ãØconditionalsuperscriptùëãsubscriptùëõ1ùëöùëäsuperscriptùëçsubscriptùëõ11‚ãØsuperscriptùëçsubscriptùëõ1ùëösuperscriptsubscript‚ÑéùëÄùëõsuperscriptsubscript‚Ñéùê∏ùëõùëõitalic-œµ\displaystyle nC_{s}^{(M)}-H(X^{n_{1}}(1),\cdots,X^{n_{1}}(m)|W,Z^{n_{1}}(1),\cdots,Z^{n_{1}}(m),h_{M}^{n},h_{E}^{n})-n\epsilon.italic_n italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_s end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_M ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - italic_H ( italic_X start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( 1 ) , ‚ãØ , italic_X start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_m ) | italic_W , italic_Z start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( 1 ) , ‚ãØ , italic_Z start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_m ) , italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT , italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) - italic_n italic_œµ .

In the above derivation, (a) follows from the memoryless property of the channel and the independence of the Xn1‚Å¢(i)superscriptùëãsubscriptùëõ1ùëñX^{n_{1}}(i)italic_X start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_i )‚Äôs, (b) is obtained by removing all those terms which correspond to the coherence intervals i‚àâùí©mùëñsubscriptùí©ùëöi\notin{\mathcal{N}}_{m}italic_i ‚àâ caligraphic_N start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT, where ùí©m={i‚àà{1,‚ãØ,m}:hM‚Å¢(i)>hE‚Å¢(i)}subscriptùí©ùëöconditional-setùëñ1‚ãØùëösubscript‚ÑéùëÄùëñsubscript‚Ñéùê∏ùëñ{\mathcal{N}}_{m}=\left\{i\in\{1,\cdots,m\}:h_{M}(i)>h_{E}(i)\right\}caligraphic_N start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT = { italic_i ‚àà { 1 , ‚ãØ , italic_m } : italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_i ) > italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_i ) }, and (c) follows from the ergodicity of the channel as m‚Üí‚àû‚Üíùëöm\to\inftyitalic_m ‚Üí ‚àû.

Now we show that the term H‚Å¢(Xn1‚Å¢(1),‚ãØ,Xn1‚Å¢(m)|W,Zn1‚Å¢(1),‚ãØ,Zn1‚Å¢(m),hMn,hEn)ùêªsuperscriptùëãsubscriptùëõ11‚ãØconditionalsuperscriptùëãsubscriptùëõ1ùëöùëäsuperscriptùëçsubscriptùëõ11‚ãØsuperscriptùëçsubscriptùëõ1ùëösuperscriptsubscript‚ÑéùëÄùëõsuperscriptsubscript‚Ñéùê∏ùëõH(X^{n_{1}}(1),\cdots,X^{n_{1}}(m)|W,Z^{n_{1}}(1),\cdots,Z^{n_{1}}(m),h_{M}^{n},h_{E}^{n})italic_H ( italic_X start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( 1 ) , ‚ãØ , italic_X start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_m ) | italic_W , italic_Z start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( 1 ) , ‚ãØ , italic_Z start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_m ) , italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT , italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) vanishes as m,n1‚Üí‚àû‚Üíùëösubscriptùëõ1m,n_{1}\to\inftyitalic_m , italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚Üí ‚àû by using a list decoding argument. In this list decoding, at coherence interval iùëñiitalic_i, the eavesdropper first constructs a list ‚Ñíisubscript‚Ñíùëñ{\mathcal{L}}_{i}caligraphic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT such that xn1‚Å¢(i)‚àà‚Ñíisuperscriptùë•subscriptùëõ1ùëñsubscript‚Ñíùëñx^{n_{1}}(i)\in{\mathcal{L}}_{i}italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_i ) ‚àà caligraphic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT if (xn1‚Å¢(i),zn1‚Å¢(i))superscriptùë•subscriptùëõ1ùëñsuperscriptùëßsubscriptùëõ1ùëñ(x^{n_{1}}(i),z^{n_{1}}(i))( italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_i ) , italic_z start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_i ) ) are jointly typical. Let ‚Ñí=‚Ñí1√ó‚Ñí2√ó‚ãØ√ó‚Ñím‚Ñísubscript‚Ñí1subscript‚Ñí2‚ãØsubscript‚Ñíùëö{\mathcal{L}}={\mathcal{L}}_{1}\times{\mathcal{L}}_{2}\times\cdots\times{\mathcal{L}}_{m}caligraphic_L = caligraphic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT √ó caligraphic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT √ó ‚ãØ √ó caligraphic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT. Given wùë§witalic_w, the eavesdropper declares that x^n=(xn1‚Å¢(1),‚ãØ,xn1‚Å¢(m))superscript^ùë•ùëõsuperscriptùë•subscriptùëõ11‚ãØsuperscriptùë•subscriptùëõ1ùëö\hat{x}^{n}=(x^{n_{1}}(1),\cdots,x^{n_{1}}(m))over^ start_ARG italic_x end_ARG start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT = ( italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( 1 ) , ‚ãØ , italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_m ) ) was transmitted, if x^nsuperscript^ùë•ùëõ\hat{x}^{n}over^ start_ARG italic_x end_ARG start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT is the only codeword such that x^n‚ààB‚Å¢(w)‚à©‚Ñísuperscript^ùë•ùëõùêµùë§‚Ñí\hat{x}^{n}\in B(w)\cap{\mathcal{L}}over^ start_ARG italic_x end_ARG start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚àà italic_B ( italic_w ) ‚à© caligraphic_L, where B‚Å¢(w)ùêµùë§B(w)italic_B ( italic_w ) is the set of codewords corresponding to the message wùë§witalic_w. If the eavesdropper finds none or more than one such sequence, then it declares an error. Hence, there are two type of error events: 1) ‚Ñ∞1subscript‚Ñ∞1{\mathcal{E}}_{1}caligraphic_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT: the transmitted codeword xtnsubscriptsuperscriptùë•ùëõùë°x^{n}_{t}italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT is not in ‚Ñí‚Ñí{\mathcal{L}}caligraphic_L, 2) ‚Ñ∞2subscript‚Ñ∞2{\mathcal{E}}_{2}caligraphic_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT: ‚àÉxn‚â†xtnsuperscriptùë•ùëõsubscriptsuperscriptùë•ùëõùë°\exists x^{n}\neq x^{n}_{t}‚àÉ italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚â† italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT such that xn‚ààB‚Å¢(w)‚à©‚Ñísuperscriptùë•ùëõùêµùë§‚Ñíx^{n}\in B(w)\cap{\mathcal{L}}italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚àà italic_B ( italic_w ) ‚à© caligraphic_L. Thus the error probability Pr‚Å¢(x^n‚â†xtn)=Pr‚Å¢(‚Ñ∞1‚à™‚Ñ∞2)‚â§Pr‚Å¢(‚Ñ∞1)+Pr‚Å¢(‚Ñ∞2)Prsuperscript^ùë•ùëõsubscriptsuperscriptùë•ùëõùë°Prsubscript‚Ñ∞1subscript‚Ñ∞2Prsubscript‚Ñ∞1Prsubscript‚Ñ∞2\textrm{Pr}(\hat{x}^{n}\neq x^{n}_{t})=\textrm{Pr}({\mathcal{E}}_{1}\cup{\mathcal{E}}_{2})\leq\textrm{Pr}({\mathcal{E}}_{1})+\textrm{Pr}({\mathcal{E}}_{2})Pr ( over^ start_ARG italic_x end_ARG start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚â† italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) = Pr ( caligraphic_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à™ caligraphic_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ‚â§ Pr ( caligraphic_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) + Pr ( caligraphic_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ). Based on the AEP, we know that Pr‚Å¢(‚Ñ∞1)‚â§œµ1Prsubscript‚Ñ∞1subscriptitalic-œµ1\textrm{Pr}({\mathcal{E}}_{1})\leq\epsilon_{1}Pr ( caligraphic_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ‚â§ italic_œµ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT. We let

œïi‚Å¢(xn1‚Å¢(i)|zn1‚Å¢(i))={1,when¬†(xn1‚Å¢(i),zn1‚Å¢(i))¬†are jointly typical,0,otherwise.subscriptitalic-œïùëñconditionalsuperscriptùë•subscriptùëõ1ùëñsuperscriptùëßsubscriptùëõ1ùëñcases1when¬†(xn1‚Å¢(i),zn1‚Å¢(i))¬†are jointly typical,0otherwise.\displaystyle\phi_{i}(x^{n_{1}}(i)|z^{n_{1}}(i))~{}=~{}\left\{\begin{array}[]{ll}1,&\textrm{when $(x^{n_{1}}(i),z^{n_{1}}(i))$ are jointly typical,}\\ 0,&\textrm{otherwise.}\end{array}\right.italic_œï start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_i ) | italic_z start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_i ) ) = { start_ARRAY start_ROW start_CELL 1 , end_CELL start_CELL when ( italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_i ) , italic_z start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_i ) ) are jointly typical, end_CELL end_ROW start_ROW start_CELL 0 , end_CELL start_CELL otherwise. end_CELL end_ROW end_ARRAY (27)

Now
