‚â§\displaystyle\leq‚â§ ùîº‚Å¢{1+‚àëxn1‚Å¢(i)‚â†xtn1‚Å¢(i)œïi‚Å¢(xn1‚Å¢(i)|zn1‚Å¢(i))}ùîº1subscriptsuperscriptùë•subscriptùëõ1ùëñsubscriptsuperscriptùë•subscriptùëõ1ùë°ùëñsubscriptitalic-œïùëñconditionalsuperscriptùë•subscriptùëõ1ùëñsuperscriptùëßsubscriptùëõ1ùëñ\displaystyle{\mathbb{E}}\left\{1+\sum\limits_{x^{n_{1}}(i)\neq x^{n_{1}}_{t}(i)}\phi_{i}(x^{n_{1}}(i)|z^{n_{1}}(i))\right\}blackboard_E { 1 + ‚àë start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_i ) ‚â† italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_i ) end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_œï start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_i ) | italic_z start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_i ) ) }
‚â§\displaystyle\leq‚â§ 1+‚àëxn1‚Å¢(i)‚â†xtn1‚Å¢(i)ùîº‚Å¢{œïi‚Å¢(xn1‚Å¢(i)|zn1‚Å¢(i))}1subscriptsuperscriptùë•subscriptùëõ1ùëñsubscriptsuperscriptùë•subscriptùëõ1ùë°ùëñùîºsubscriptitalic-œïùëñconditionalsuperscriptùë•subscriptùëõ1ùëñsuperscriptùëßsubscriptùëõ1ùëñ\displaystyle 1+\sum\limits_{x^{n_{1}}(i)\neq x^{n_{1}}_{t}(i)}{\mathbb{E}}\left\{\phi_{i}(x^{n_{1}}(i)|z^{n_{1}}(i))\right\}1 + ‚àë start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_i ) ‚â† italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_i ) end_POSTSUBSCRIPT blackboard_E { italic_œï start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_i ) | italic_z start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_i ) ) }
‚â§\displaystyle\leq‚â§ 1+2n1‚Å¢[log‚Å°(1+hM‚Å¢(i)‚Å¢P‚Å¢(hM‚Å¢(i)))‚àílog‚Å°(1+hE‚Å¢(i)‚Å¢P‚Å¢(hM‚Å¢(i)))‚àíœµ]1superscript2subscriptùëõ1delimited-[]1subscript‚ÑéùëÄùëñùëÉsubscript‚ÑéùëÄùëñ1subscript‚Ñéùê∏ùëñùëÉsubscript‚ÑéùëÄùëñitalic-œµ\displaystyle 1+2^{{n_{1}}\left[\log(1+h_{M}(i)P(h_{M}(i)))-\log(1+h_{E}(i)P(h_{M}(i)))-\epsilon\right]}1 + 2 start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT [ roman_log ( 1 + italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_i ) italic_P ( italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_i ) ) ) - roman_log ( 1 + italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_i ) italic_P ( italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_i ) ) ) - italic_œµ ] end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT
‚â§\displaystyle\leq‚â§ 2n1‚Å¢([log‚Å°(1+hM‚Å¢(i)‚Å¢P‚Å¢(hM‚Å¢(i)))‚àílog‚Å°(1+hE‚Å¢(i)‚Å¢P‚Å¢(hM‚Å¢(i)))‚àíœµ]++1n1).superscript2subscriptùëõ1superscriptdelimited-[]1subscript‚ÑéùëÄùëñùëÉsubscript‚ÑéùëÄùëñ1subscript‚Ñéùê∏ùëñùëÉsubscript‚ÑéùëÄùëñitalic-œµ1subscriptùëõ1\displaystyle 2^{{n_{1}}\left(\left[\log(1+h_{M}(i)P(h_{M}(i)))-\log(1+h_{E}(i)P(h_{M}(i)))-\epsilon\right]^{+}+\frac{1}{n_{1}}\right)}~{}.2 start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( [ roman_log ( 1 + italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_i ) italic_P ( italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_i ) ) ) - roman_log ( 1 + italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_i ) italic_P ( italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_i ) ) ) - italic_œµ ] start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT .

Hence

ùîº‚Å¢{‚Äñ‚Ñí‚Äñ}=‚àèi=1mùîº‚Å¢{‚Äñ‚Ñíi‚Äñ}‚â§2‚àëi=1mn1‚Å¢([log‚Å°(1+hM‚Å¢(i)‚Å¢P‚Å¢(hM‚Å¢(i)))‚àílog‚Å°(1+hE‚Å¢(i)‚Å¢P‚Å¢(hM‚Å¢(i)))‚àíœµ]++1n1).ùîºnorm‚Ñísuperscriptsubscriptproductùëñ1ùëöùîºnormsubscript‚Ñíùëñsuperscript2superscriptsubscriptùëñ1ùëösubscriptùëõ1superscriptdelimited-[]1subscript‚ÑéùëÄùëñùëÉsubscript‚ÑéùëÄùëñ1subscript‚Ñéùê∏ùëñùëÉsubscript‚ÑéùëÄùëñitalic-œµ1subscriptùëõ1\displaystyle{\mathbb{E}}\{\|{\mathcal{L}}\|\}~{}=~{}\prod\limits_{i=1}^{m}{\mathbb{E}}\{\|{\mathcal{L}}_{i}\|\}~{}\leq~{}2^{\sum\limits_{i=1}^{m}n_{1}\left(\left[\log(1+h_{M}(i)P(h_{M}(i)))-\log(1+h_{E}(i)P(h_{M}(i)))-\epsilon\right]^{+}+\frac{1}{n_{1}}\right)}~{}.blackboard_E { ‚à• caligraphic_L ‚à• } = ‚àè start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_m end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT blackboard_E { ‚à• caligraphic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• } ‚â§ 2 start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚àë start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_m end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( [ roman_log ( 1 + italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_i ) italic_P ( italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_i ) ) ) - roman_log ( 1 + italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_i ) italic_P ( italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_i ) ) ) - italic_œµ ] start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT . (29)

Thus

Pr‚Å¢(‚Ñ∞2)Prsubscript‚Ñ∞2\displaystyle\textrm{Pr}({\mathcal{E}}_{2})Pr ( caligraphic_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ‚â§\displaystyle\leq‚â§ ùîº‚Å¢{‚àëxn‚àà‚Ñí,xn‚â†xtnPr‚Å¢(xn‚ààB‚Å¢(w))}ùîºsubscriptformulae-sequencesuperscriptùë•ùëõ‚Ñísuperscriptùë•ùëõsubscriptsuperscriptùë•ùëõùë°Prsuperscriptùë•ùëõùêµùë§\displaystyle{\mathbb{E}}\left\{\sum\limits_{x^{n}\in{\mathcal{L}},x^{n}\neq x^{n}_{t}}\textrm{Pr}(x^{n}\in B(w))\right\}blackboard_E { ‚àë start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚àà caligraphic_L , italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚â† italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT Pr ( italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚àà italic_B ( italic_w ) ) }
‚â§(a)ùëé\displaystyle\overset{(a)}{\leq}start_OVERACCENT ( italic_a ) end_OVERACCENT start_ARG ‚â§ end_ARG ùîº‚Å¢{‚Äñ‚Ñí‚Äñ‚Å¢2‚àín‚Å¢Rs}ùîºnorm‚Ñísuperscript2ùëõsubscriptùëÖùë†\displaystyle{\mathbb{E}}\left\{\|{\mathcal{L}}\|2^{-nR_{s}}\right\}blackboard_E { ‚à• caligraphic_L ‚à• 2 start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - italic_n italic_R start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_s end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT }
‚â§\displaystyle\leq‚â§ 2‚àín‚Å¢Rs‚Å¢2‚àëi=1mn1‚Å¢([log‚Å°(1+hM‚Å¢(i)‚Å¢P‚Å¢(hM‚Å¢(i)))‚àílog‚Å°(1+hE‚Å¢(i)‚Å¢P‚Å¢(hM‚Å¢(i)))‚àíœµ]++1n1)superscript2ùëõsubscriptùëÖùë†superscript2superscriptsubscriptùëñ1ùëösubscriptùëõ1superscriptdelimited-[]1subscript‚ÑéùëÄùëñùëÉsubscript‚ÑéùëÄùëñ1subscript‚Ñéùê∏ùëñùëÉsubscript‚ÑéùëÄùëñitalic-œµ1subscriptùëõ1\displaystyle 2^{-nR_{s}}2^{\sum\limits_{i=1}^{m}n_{1}\left(\left[\log(1+h_{M}(i)P(h_{M}(i)))-\log(1+h_{E}(i)P(h_{M}(i)))-\epsilon\right]^{+}+\frac{1}{n_{1}}\right)}2 start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - italic_n italic_R start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_s end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚àë start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_m end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( [ roman_log ( 1 + italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_i ) italic_P ( italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_i ) ) ) - roman_log ( 1 + italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_i ) italic_P ( italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_i ) ) ) - italic_œµ ] start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT
‚â§\displaystyle\leq‚â§ 2‚àín‚Å¢(Rs‚àí1m‚Å¢‚àëi=1m([log‚Å°(1+hM‚Å¢(i)‚Å¢P‚Å¢(hM‚Å¢(i)))‚àílog‚Å°(1+hE‚Å¢(i)‚Å¢P‚Å¢(hM‚Å¢(i)))‚àíœµ]++1n1))superscript2ùëõsubscriptùëÖùë†1ùëösuperscriptsubscriptùëñ1ùëösuperscriptdelimited-[]1subscript‚ÑéùëÄùëñùëÉsubscript‚ÑéùëÄùëñ1subscript‚Ñéùê∏ùëñùëÉsubscript‚ÑéùëÄùëñitalic-œµ1subscriptùëõ1\displaystyle 2^{-n\left(R_{s}-\frac{1}{m}\sum\limits_{i=1}^{m}\left(\left[\log(1+h_{M}(i)P(h_{M}(i)))-\log(1+h_{E}(i)P(h_{M}(i)))-\epsilon\right]^{+}+\frac{1}{n_{1}}\right)\right)}2 start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - italic_n ( italic_R start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_s end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_m end_ARG ‚àë start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_m end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( [ roman_log ( 1 + italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_i ) italic_P ( italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_i ) ) ) - roman_log ( 1 + italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_i ) italic_P ( italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_i ) ) ) - italic_œµ ] start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG ) ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT
=\displaystyle== 2‚àín‚Å¢(Rs‚àí1m‚Å¢‚àëi=1m([log‚Å°(1+hM‚Å¢(i)‚Å¢P‚Å¢(hM‚Å¢(i)))‚àílog‚Å°(1+hE‚Å¢(i)‚Å¢P‚Å¢(hM‚Å¢(i)))]++1n1)+|ùí©m|‚Å¢œµm),superscript2ùëõsubscriptùëÖùë†1ùëösuperscriptsubscriptùëñ1ùëösuperscriptdelimited-[]1subscript‚ÑéùëÄùëñùëÉsubscript‚ÑéùëÄùëñ1subscript‚Ñéùê∏ùëñùëÉsubscript‚ÑéùëÄùëñ1subscriptùëõ1subscriptùí©ùëöitalic-œµùëö\displaystyle 2^{-n\left(R_{s}-\frac{1}{m}\sum\limits_{i=1}^{m}\left(\left[\log(1+h_{M}(i)P(h_{M}(i)))-\log(1+h_{E}(i)P(h_{M}(i)))\right]^{+}+\frac{1}{n_{1}}\right)+\frac{|{\mathcal{N}}_{m}|\epsilon}{m}\right)},2 start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - italic_n ( italic_R start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_s end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_m end_ARG ‚àë start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_m end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( [ roman_log ( 1 + italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_i ) italic_P ( italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_i ) ) ) - roman_log ( 1 + italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_i ) italic_P ( italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_i ) ) ) ] start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG ) + divide start_ARG | caligraphic_N start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT | italic_œµ end_ARG start_ARG italic_m end_ARG ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ,

where (a) follows from the uniform distribution of the codewords in B‚Å¢(w)ùêµùë§B(w)italic_B ( italic_w ). Now as n1‚Üí‚àû‚Üísubscriptùëõ1n_{1}\to\inftyitalic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚Üí ‚àû and m‚Üí‚àû‚Üíùëöm\to\inftyitalic_m ‚Üí ‚àû, we get

Pr‚Å¢(‚Ñ∞2)‚â§2‚àín‚Å¢(Cs‚àíŒ¥‚àíCs+c‚Å¢œµ)=2‚àín‚Å¢(c‚Å¢œµ‚àíŒ¥),Prsubscript‚Ñ∞2superscript2ùëõsubscriptùê∂ùë†ùõøsubscriptùê∂ùë†ùëêitalic-œµsuperscript2ùëõùëêitalic-œµùõø\textrm{Pr}({\mathcal{E}}_{2})~{}\leq~{}2^{-n\left(C_{s}-\delta-C_{s}+c\epsilon\right)}~{}=~{}2^{-n(c\epsilon-\delta)},Pr ( caligraphic_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ‚â§ 2 start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - italic_n ( italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_s end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - italic_Œ¥ - italic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_s end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_c italic_œµ ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT = 2 start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - italic_n ( italic_c italic_œµ - italic_Œ¥ ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ,

where c=Pr‚Å¢(hM>hE)ùëêPrsubscript‚ÑéùëÄsubscript‚Ñéùê∏c=\textrm{Pr}(h_{M}>h_{E})italic_c = Pr ( italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT > italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ). Thus, by choosing œµ>(Œ¥/c)italic-œµùõøùëê\epsilon>(\delta/c)italic_œµ > ( italic_Œ¥ / italic_c ), the error probability Pr‚Å¢(‚Ñ∞2)‚Üí0‚ÜíPrsubscript‚Ñ∞20\textrm{Pr}({\mathcal{E}}_{2})\to 0Pr ( caligraphic_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ‚Üí 0 as n‚Üí‚àû‚Üíùëõn\to\inftyitalic_n ‚Üí ‚àû. Now using Fano‚Äôs inequality, we get

H‚Å¢(Xn1‚Å¢(1),‚ãØ,Xn1‚Å¢(m)|W,Zn1‚Å¢(1),‚ãØ,Zn1‚Å¢(m),hMn,hEn)‚â§n‚Å¢Œ¥n‚Üí0as¬†n‚Üí‚àû.ùêªsuperscriptùëãsubscriptùëõ11‚ãØconditionalsuperscriptùëãsubscriptùëõ1ùëöùëäsuperscriptùëçsubscriptùëõ11‚ãØsuperscriptùëçsubscriptùëõ1ùëösuperscriptsubscript‚ÑéùëÄùëõsuperscriptsubscript‚Ñéùê∏ùëõùëõsubscriptùõøùëõ‚Üíabsent0as¬†n‚Üí‚àûH(X^{n_{1}}(1),\cdots,X^{n_{1}}(m)|W,Z^{n_{1}}(1),\cdots,Z^{n_{1}}(m),h_{M}^{n},h_{E}^{n})~{}\leq~{}n\delta_{n}\qquad\mbox{$\to 0$}\qquad\mbox{as $n\to\infty$}.italic_H ( italic_X start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( 1 ) , ‚ãØ , italic_X start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_m ) | italic_W , italic_Z start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( 1 ) , ‚ãØ , italic_Z start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_m ) , italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT , italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) ‚â§ italic_n italic_Œ¥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚Üí 0 as italic_n ‚Üí ‚àû .

Combining this with (24), we get the desired result.

For the converse part, consider any sequence of (2n‚Å¢Rs,n)superscript2ùëõsubscriptùëÖùë†ùëõ(2^{nR_{s}},n)( 2 start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n italic_R start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_s end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT , italic_n ) codes with perfect secrecy rate RssubscriptùëÖùë†R_{s}italic_R start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_s end_POSTSUBSCRIPT and equivocation rate ResubscriptùëÖùëíR_{e}italic_R start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_e end_POSTSUBSCRIPT, such that Re>Rs‚àíœµsubscriptùëÖùëísubscriptùëÖùë†italic-œµR_{e}>R_{s}-\epsilonitalic_R start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_e end_POSTSUBSCRIPT > italic_R start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_s end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - italic_œµ, with average power less than or equal to P¬Ø¬ØùëÉ\bar{P}over¬Ø start_ARG italic_P end_ARG and error probability Pen‚Üí0‚ÜísuperscriptsubscriptùëÉùëíùëõ0P_{e}^{n}\to 0italic_P start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_e end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚Üí 0 as n‚Üí‚àû‚Üíùëõn\rightarrow\inftyitalic_n ‚Üí ‚àû. We follow the same steps used in the proof of the converse in Theorem¬†1 with the only difference that now the transmission power Pn(.)P^{n}(.)italic_P start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( . ) only depends on hMsubscript‚ÑéùëÄh_{M}italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT. From (A), we get

n‚Å¢ReùëõsubscriptùëÖùëí\displaystyle nR_{e}italic_n italic_R start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_e end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚â§\displaystyle\leq‚â§ ‚àëi=1n‚à¨I‚Å¢(X;Y|Z,hM,hE)‚Å¢ùüè{hM‚Å¢(i)=hM,hE‚Å¢(i)=hE}‚Å¢dhM‚Å¢dhE+n‚Å¢Œ¥nsuperscriptsubscriptùëñ1ùëõdouble-integralùêºùëãconditionalùëåùëçsubscript‚ÑéùëÄsubscript‚Ñéùê∏subscript1formulae-sequencesubscript‚ÑéùëÄùëñsubscript‚ÑéùëÄsubscript‚Ñéùê∏ùëñsubscript‚Ñéùê∏differential-dsubscript‚ÑéùëÄdifferential-dsubscript‚Ñéùê∏ùëõsubscriptùõøùëõ\displaystyle\sum_{i=1}^{n}\iint I(X;Y|Z,h_{M},h_{E}){\mathbf{1}}_{\{h_{M}(i)=h_{M},h_{E}(i)=h_{E}\}}{\mathrm{d}}h_{M}{\mathrm{d}}h_{E}+n\delta_{n}‚àë start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à¨ italic_I ( italic_X ; italic_Y | italic_Z , italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) bold_1 start_POSTSUBSCRIPT { italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_i ) = italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_i ) = italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT } end_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_d italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_d italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_n italic_Œ¥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUBSCRIPT
=\displaystyle== ‚à¨I‚Å¢(X;Y|Z,hM,hE)‚Å¢N‚Å¢(hM,hE)‚Å¢dhM‚Å¢dhE+n‚Å¢Œ¥ndouble-integralùêºùëãconditionalùëåùëçsubscript‚ÑéùëÄsubscript‚Ñéùê∏ùëÅsubscript‚ÑéùëÄsubscript‚Ñéùê∏differential-dsubscript‚ÑéùëÄdifferential-dsubscript‚Ñéùê∏ùëõsubscriptùõøùëõ\displaystyle\iint I(X;Y|Z,h_{M},h_{E})N(h_{M},h_{E}){\mathrm{d}}h_{M}{\mathrm{d}}h_{E}+n\delta_{n}‚à¨ italic_I ( italic_X ; italic_Y | italic_Z , italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) italic_N ( italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) roman_d italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_d italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_n italic_Œ¥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUBSCRIPT
‚â§\displaystyle{\leq}‚â§ ‚à¨N‚Å¢(hM,hE)‚Å¢[log‚Å°(1+hM‚Å¢Pn‚Å¢(hM))‚àílog‚Å°(1+hE‚Å¢Pn‚Å¢(hM))]+‚Å¢dhM‚Å¢dhE+n‚Å¢Œ¥n.double-integralùëÅsubscript‚ÑéùëÄsubscript‚Ñéùê∏superscriptdelimited-[]1subscript‚ÑéùëÄsuperscriptùëÉùëõsubscript‚ÑéùëÄ1subscript‚Ñéùê∏superscriptùëÉùëõsubscript‚ÑéùëÄdifferential-dsubscript‚ÑéùëÄdifferential-dsubscript‚Ñéùê∏ùëõsubscriptùõøùëõ\displaystyle\iint N(h_{M},h_{E})\left[\log(1+h_{M}P^{n}(h_{M}))-\log(1+h_{E}P^{n}(h_{M}))\right]^{+}{\mathrm{d}}h_{M}{\mathrm{d}}h_{E}+n\delta_{n}.‚à¨ italic_N ( italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) [ roman_log ( 1 + italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_P start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ) - roman_log ( 1 + italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_P start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ) ] start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT roman_d italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_d italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_n italic_Œ¥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUBSCRIPT .

This follows from the fact that given hMsubscript‚ÑéùëÄh_{M}italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT and hEsubscript‚Ñéùê∏h_{E}italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT, the fading channel reduces to an AWGN channel with channel gains (hM,hE)subscript‚ÑéùëÄsubscript‚Ñéùê∏(h_{M},h_{E})( italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) and average transmission power Pn‚Å¢(hM)superscriptùëÉùëõsubscript‚ÑéùëÄP^{n}(h_{M})italic_P start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ), for which Gaussian inputs are known to be optimal [5, 6].

Similar to the proof of Theorem¬†1, we take the limit over the convergent subsequence and use the ergodicity of the channel to obtain

Re‚â§‚à¨[log‚Å°(1+hM‚Å¢P‚Å¢(hM))‚àílog‚Å°(1+hE‚Å¢P‚Å¢(hM))]+‚Å¢f‚Å¢(hM)‚Å¢f‚Å¢(hE)‚Å¢dhM‚Å¢dhE+Œ¥n,subscriptùëÖùëídouble-integralsuperscriptdelimited-[]1subscript‚ÑéùëÄùëÉsubscript‚ÑéùëÄ1subscript‚Ñéùê∏ùëÉsubscript‚ÑéùëÄùëìsubscript‚ÑéùëÄùëìsubscript‚Ñéùê∏differential-dsubscript‚ÑéùëÄdifferential-dsubscript‚Ñéùê∏subscriptùõøùëõ\displaystyle R_{e}\leq\iint\left[\log(1+h_{M}P(h_{M}))-\log(1+h_{E}P(h_{M}))\right]^{+}f(h_{M})f(h_{E}){\mathrm{d}}h_{M}{\mathrm{d}}h_{E}+\delta_{n},italic_R start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_e end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚â§ ‚à¨ [ roman_log ( 1 + italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_P ( italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ) - roman_log ( 1 + italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_P ( italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ) ] start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_f ( italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) italic_f ( italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) roman_d italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_d italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_E end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_Œ¥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , (31)

where ùîº‚Å¢{P‚Å¢(hM)}‚â§P¬ØùîºùëÉsubscript‚ÑéùëÄ¬ØùëÉ{\mathbb{E}}\{P(h_{M})\}\leq\bar{P}blackboard_E { italic_P ( italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) } ‚â§ over¬Ø start_ARG italic_P end_ARG. The claim is thus proved.

References

  • [2] A. D. Wyner, ‚ÄúThe wire-tap channel,‚Äù Bell System Technical Journal, vol.¬†54, no.¬†8, pp.¬†1355-‚Äì1387, 1975.
  • [3] I. Csisza¬¥¬¥ùëé\acute{a}over¬¥ start_ARG italic_a end_ARGr and J. K√∂rner, ‚ÄúBroadcast channels with confidential messages,‚Äù IEEE Trans. on Information Theory, vol.¬†24, pp.¬†339-‚Äì348, May¬†1978.
  • [4] G. Caire, G. Taricco and E. Biglieri, ‚ÄúOptimum power control over fading channels,‚Äù IEEE Trans. on Information Theory, vol.¬†45, no.¬†5, pp.¬†1468-‚Äì1489, July¬†1999.
  • [5] S. K. Leung-Yan-Cheong and M. E. Hellman, ‚ÄúThe Gaussian Wire-Tap Channel,‚Äù IEEE Trans. on Information Theory, vol.¬†24, pp.¬†451-‚Äì456, July¬†1978.
  • [6] Y. Liang and H. Vincent Poor, ‚ÄúGeneralized multiple access channels with confidential messages,‚Äù Submitted to IEEE Trans. on Information Theory, April¬†2006.
